::Killfest::

Killfest nods and looks over the map. The Alliance base looked very 
well defended.

"Are you sure its wise to side with these Predacons against the 
Alliance?" Scyther's voice sounds over the terrorrists' internal 
communication system, "The Alliance looks like they know how to place 
a well defended base."

"We will see," Killfest replies silently. He looks over the map again.

"Is there any particular reason you Predacons are bent on destroying 
the Alliance?" he asks outloud, looking criticaly on the map.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::KitKat::
> 
> "Fair enough. Then we shall forgo this and move onto other issues."
> 
> She walked down the hall with Killfest to the large conference 
room. 
> It had a holoprojector and grid maps that were on the walls.
> "This is where we are, and here are the other bases of the other 
> groups. Here are the maximal outposts. Here is the Allience base, 
and 
> here is Megatron and Aracnia's old base." She pointed to the 
Allience 
> base. "Here is where our greatest enemiy resides."
